text: Apani ki ai byaktike dekhenani, ye ib‌rahimera sathe tamra raba sambandhe bitarke lipta hayechila, yehetu allah‌ take rajatba [1] diyechilena. Yakhana ib‌rahima balalena, ‘amara raba tini'i jini jibana dana karena o mrtyu ghatana, se balala, ‘ami'o to jibana dana kari o mrtyu ghata'i. Ib‌rahima balalena, ‘niscaya'i allah‌ suryake purba dika theke udaya karana, tumi setake pascima dika theke udaya kara'o to [2]. Tarapara ye kuphari karechila se hatabud'dhi haye gela.
